description: Try our easy to follow Roast Cauliflower & Chickpea Pita recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Roast Cauliflower & Chickpea Pita Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 420 g no added salt chickpeas, rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Warm pita pockets as per packet instructions. To serve, spread with hummus, top with spiced vegetables and kale, and drizzle over yoghurt.
Warm pita pockets as per packet instructions. To serve, spread with hummus, top with spiced vegetables and kale, and drizzle over yoghurt.
